Description: Glazed pottery oil lamp; wheel-made; light grey clay fabric, covered all over with light turquoised blue glaze; globular body with rising rim for the filling hole, loop handle, long spout and flat base
Curator's comments: Cf. R. Mason & J. Tugwell, 'Fatimid Tall-Necked Lamps and Their Associates: A Typology', Journal of the American Research Center in Egypt 47 (2011) 335-53, esp. 347-52 (Group Two).
